name: I, AI (itch)
description:
I, AI is a driving based first person metroidvania created for the Metroidvania Month 19 Gamejam.

It’s the year 37XX, Machines are the dominant species on the planet and hoomanz have devolved to cavemen. You’re an A.I. roadster who finds itself in an arid wasteland when a glitch causes the master control system to send it on an impossible mission. You haven’t been told what your mission is, you’re tired of the sand getting in your gears and you just want to go home. This is now your mission.
